szakacs.kpi.fei.tuke.intrfc.arena.game

Interface ResettableGameClass

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ActorManagerPrivileged, GameStateTester, GameUpdater, GameWorldPrivileged, PlayerManagerPrivileged
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGameUpdater, ActorManager, GameStateTesterBasic, GameUpdaterEnemies, GameUpdaterWalls, PlayerManager, TreasureScooperWorld

    public interface ResettableGameClass
    The interface of a class that is designed to be reused in every game level.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void startNewGame(GameLevelPrivileged gameLevel, DummyLevel level)
      Performs the actions to reset the implementing class to its default state when a new game level begins.

    • Method Detail

      • startNewGame

        void startNewGame(GameLevelPrivileged gameLevel,
                  DummyLevel level)
           throws GameLevelInitializationException
        Performs the actions to reset the implementing class to its default state when a new game level begins.
        Parameters:
        gameLevel - the object representing the current game level
        level - the value object containing additional information to initiazlize the current game level
        Throws:
        GameLevelInitializationException - if some error has occurred which prevented initialization (malformed data in the value object etc.)
